prerequisites: Prerequisite: Astronomy 100, or 110, or Physics 131, 132, 141 or 142
summary: Special topics in modern astrophysics will be explored in order to understand the physical processes at work in a variety of cosmic settings. Possible topics include the solar weather and its impact on Earth, extra-solar planets, black holes, dark matter, gravitational lensing, large-scale structures and dark energy in an accelerating universe.
title: Topics in Modern Astrophysics
